source.name: Profile Words
source.description:
The frequency with which arbitrarily selected word appear in the Twitter profiles of users who mention each presidential candidate in tweets during a 30-day period.

Ignore what's in the "Licensing & Attribution" area: This dataset is released by Adam Green under the Open Database License (ODbL): http://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/summary/
